54.eng-name: The Book of Tribulations and Portents of the Last Hour

hadiths.text: Amir b. Sa'd reported on the authority of his father that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) came with a group of his Companions and he passed by the mosque of Banu Mu'awiya. The rest of the hadith is the same

chapter.ara-name: باب هَلاَكُ هَذِهِ الأُمَّةِ بَعْضِهِمْ بِبَعْضٍ
chapter.eng-name: (Parts of) This Ummah Will Destroy One Another
